Articles.Content: Pls add FL-Ion engines. I want ion engines that are bigger.

It basically allows for you to scale engines and other parts up (or down) and using some simple maths, scales the thrust, mass, cost....![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
